title: How Political Should My Pastor Be? | Unapologetic #64
itunes:title: How Political Should My Pastor Be? | Unapologetic #64
description: What does it mean for pastors to be political, and how political should they be? That and more on this episode of the Unapologetic show. Welcome to the Unapologetic show with Dr. Bobby Conway, the One Minute Apologist; I am your host, Tim Hull. This show is dedicated to helping you defend the truth of Christianity without compromise. Pastors have played a crucial role in a society's direction throughout history as they care for and influence people. Throughout history, Churchmen have debated at what level church leadership should play in the role of governance. There seems to be a broad spectrum of options from the church of England, the Bishop of Rome, and other heavily involved examples, to the clearly stated separation of church and state in America. But what does the Bible say about this topic?
